mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CATEGORY_CODE ORDER BY BU_CATEGORY

SELECT B.BU_MAIN_IMG, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_H_COUNT, R.ROOM_PRICE, R.ROOM_INFO, B.BU_NO, B.BU_ADDRESS, B.AREA_NO, B.BU_CATEGORY, B.BU_TEL, B.BU_TITLE FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO WHERE B.BU_MAIN_IMG IS NOT NULL AND B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND R.ROOM_H_COUNT = 1 AND B.BU_CATEGORY = #{category}

SELECT H.MAIN_IMG, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_H_COUNT, R.ROOM_PRICE, B.BU_NO, B.BU_ADDRESS, B.AREA_NO, B.BU_CATEGORY, B.BU_TEL, B.BU_TITLE FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO INNER JOIN HOUSE H ON B.BU_TITLE = H.BU_TITLE WHERE H.MAIN_IMG IS NOT NULL AND B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND R.ROOM_H_COUNT = 1 AND B.AREA_NO = #{areaNo}

SELECT H.MAIN_IMG, R.ROOM_NO, R.ROOM_H_COUNT, R.ROOM_PRICE, B.BU_NO, B.BU_ADDRESS, B.AREA_NO, B.BU_CATEGORY, B.BU_TEL, B.BU_TITLE FROM BUSINESS B INNER JOIN ROOM R ON B.BU_NO = R.BU_NO INNER JOIN HOUSE H ON B.BU_TITLE = H.BU_TITLE WHERE H.MAIN_IMG IS NOT NULL AND B.APPROVAL = 'Y' AND R.ROOM_H_COUNT = 1 AND B.AREA_NO = #{areaNo}
